gw.api.domain.invoice

Interface InvoicingOverridable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Charge, ChargeInitializer, PolicyPeriod

    public interface InvoicingOverridable
    Implementors of this interface will have an OverridingPayer property and an OverridingInvoiceStream property. OverridingPayer and OverridingInvoiceStream are connected: When setting OverridingInvoiceStream, the stream must belong to the current payer.

    • Method Detail

      • canOverrideInvoiceStream

        boolean canOverrideInvoiceStream()
        Returns:
        true if this is a charge true if this is a policy and it has billing method agency bill true if this is a chargeInitializer that

      • validateOverridingPayerAccount

        void validateOverridingPayerAccount(Account overridingPayerAccount)
        Parameters:
        overridingPayerAccount - The Account you want as the overriding payer of this InvoicingOverridable

      • getDefaultPayer

        InvoicePayer getDefaultPayer()
        Returns:
        the payer used by default, taking into account any overriding payers

      • getOwnerAccount

        Account getOwnerAccount()
        Returns:
        the account associated with the charge owner

      • getInvoiceItems

        InvoiceItem[] getInvoiceItems()
        Returns:
        all the invoice items associated with this overridable

      • getOverridingInvoiceStreamID

        Key getOverridingInvoiceStreamID()
        Returns:
        the overriding invoice stream's id

      • getOverridingInvoiceStream

        InvoiceStream getOverridingInvoiceStream()
        Returns:
        the entities current overriding invoice stream

      • getOverridingPayerAccount

        Account getOverridingPayerAccount()
        Returns:
        the entities current overriding payer account

      • updateWith

        void updateWith(InvoicingOverrider invoicingOverrider)
        Parameters:
        invoicingOverrider - a built invoicing overridable updater Update the invoicing overrides (overriding payer account and overriding invoice stream) using the information in the updater
